articles.title: SpaceX marks 500th Falcon launch with Starlink 11-22 Mission - Teslarati
articles.description: The Starlink 11-22 mission marks SpaceX’s 500th Falcon flight & 50th Starlink launch of 2025. Will SpaceX IPO Starlink next?
articles.content:
SpaceX celebrated its 500th Falcon rocket launch with the Starlink 11-22 mission, a midweek flight from Vandenberg Space Force Base in California.
The milestone was achieved with a Falcon 9 liftoff … [+2116 chars]
